shortdesc.ph: Callback for CDN streaming state changes.
Callback for changes in CDN streaming state.

p.codeblock: virtual void onDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged(DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_STATE state, DIRECT_CDN_STREAMING_REASON reason, const char* message)
void onDirectCdnStreamingStateChanged(DirectCdnStreamingState state, DirectCdnStreamingReason reason, String message)

section.p: When the host streams directly to the CDN and the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the new streaming state, error code, and related information.

When the host pushes streams directly to the CDN and the streaming state changes, the SDK triggers this callback to report the updated streaming state, error codes, and other information. You can refer to this callback for troubleshooting.

section.title: Trigger Timing
section.p: This callback is triggered when the streaming state changes during the process of pushing streams directly to the CDN by the host.
